scripts.basic: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file src/common/index.js --bundle-output ./android/app/src/main/assets/common.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res/ --config common.config.js
scripts.HomePage: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file src/enterfile/home.js --bundle-output ./android/app/src/main/assets/home.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res/ --config business.config.js
scripts.SettingPage: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file src/enterfile/setting.js --bundle-output ./android/app/src/main/assets/setting.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res/ --config business.config.js
